promise.title: Your child can learn to calculate in their head
promise.body: The abacus is the world's most proven tool for building mental math. Kids who learn it don't just memorize facts — they build a mental picture of how numbers work. And they can practice right here.

method.title: The abacus teaches kids to see numbers
method.subtitle: Children who learn the abacus don't just memorize math facts — they build a mental picture of how numbers work. That's why abacus students develop faster mental arithmetic than any other method.

practice.title: Practice that meets your child where they are

mastery.title: Tracks real mastery
mastery.desc: Every answer updates a skill model of your child's abilities. Practice sessions target what they're ready to learn next — not what a grade level says they should know.

rewards.title: Games that teach in disguise
rewards.desc: Between drills, kids earn solo game rounds — but every game is still teaching. Match abacus images to numbers, answer complements to drive a train, race through mental math. They're always learning, whether they know it or not.
